DOC.brief_summary: This study randomize control trial test whether Culturally Sensitive Collaborative Treatment ( CSCT ) would improve outcome depressed patient visit non-psychiatric setting Taiwan .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Cultural Sensitive Collaborative Treatment Depressed Chinese
DOC.criteria: Patients attend nonpsychiatric clinic site . Patients Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) , define positive screen use PHQ9 , confirm SCAN interview . Men woman age 18 old . Able participate clinical diagnostic interview either Mandarin Fukienese dialect . Individuals willing follow concern depression symptom . Individuals complete write consent form . Women pregnant , breastfeeding , plan pregnancy within next year . Patients serious suicidal risk . Patients unstable medical illness . Clinical laboratory evidence hypothyroidism . Patients comorbid severe mental disorder Patients history treatment psychiatrist past 4 month .
